title: Azamara Cruises
description: Azamara Cruises is a luxury cruise line that offers a variety of cruises to destinations around the world.
responsibilities: Led frontend architecture for enterprise cruise booking platform
Built component library with React, TypeScript, and GraphQL APIs
Integrated AWS AppSync and CrafterCMS for scalable content management
Maintained 99.9% uptime across critical booking and payment flows
achievements: Reduced deployment time by 40% through component reusability
Maintained 99.9% uptime for critical booking systems
Led successful migration from legacy Royal Caribbean infrastructure
